1.title: Learn Letter A

episode of.title: Turn & Learn ABCs: Super Simple (TV Series 2016–2017)

1.plot: Turn and Learn ABCs is a great way to learn the letters of the alphabet and simple vocabulary. In this video, flip the alphabet tiles to reveal words starting with the letter A. Can you guess the words?

episode of.title: Turn & Learn ABCs: Super Simple (TV Series 2016–2017)

imdb.title: Turn & Learn ABCs: Super Simple
plot: From Super Simple, Turn & Learn ABCs is a guessing game that helps children learn the letters of the alphabet and simple vocabulary words! Is it an airplane? Or maybe it's an alligator. Flip the tiles to find out!
